overview: Nurturing Daddy Max Sargent runs a support group for men who have lost their fathers or sons. As the hot attendees listen to each other's stories, awkward glances slowly turn to sexual attraction. Stoic daddy Rodney Steele bonds with young stud Trent Ferris, while anguished Sam Truitt finds solace in the arms of warm, muscular Max. Starring Rodney Steele, Max Sargent, Sam Truitt, Trent Ferris and Calvin Banks.
title: Fathers & Sons 5
